attributes.action: Stop standing charges rising when the energy cost is increased.
attributes.additional_details: Because I'm concerned that it's greatly increasing the cost of living, which will ultimately raise deaths and mental health issues.
attributes.background: Stop charging higher standing charges when it's the gas and oil costing so much more not the maintenance or the infrastructure.

rejection.details:
Decisions about standing charges are a matter for utility providers and Ofgem, not the UK Government or Parliament. The price cap is a cap on a unit of gas and electricity, with standing charges taken into account. Find out more about the energy price cap, including how it includes standing charges, here: https://www.ofgem.gov.uk/check-if-energy-price-cap-affects-you

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Pass a law that prevents the use of standing charges by utility companies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621561
